title: Introduction to JavaScript
description: An overview of JavaScript and its applications.

title: Variables in JavaScript
description: Learn how to declare and use variables in JavaScript.

title: Data Types in JavaScript
description: Understand different data types in JavaScript and their uses.

title: If-Else Statements in JavaScript
description: Explore conditional statements and control flow.

title: Loops in JavaScript
description: Learn about looping structures and how to iterate over data.

title: Functions in JavaScript
description: Understand how to create and use functions.

title: Arrays in JavaScript
description: Learn about arrays and methods to manipulate array data.

title: Objects in JavaScript
description: Discover objects and their importance in JavaScript.

title: Scope and Closures
description: Explore variable scope and closures in JavaScript.

title: DOM Manipulation
description: Learn to manipulate the Document Object Model with JavaScript.

title: Events in JavaScript
description: Understand how to handle user interactions with events.

title: ES6 and Modern JavaScript
description: Dive into new features introduced in ES6 and beyond.

title: Error Handling in JavaScript
description: Learn methods to handle errors and exceptions.

title: Modules in JavaScript
description: Understand modularity and how to organize code with modules.

title: Regular Expressions
description: Learn about regular expressions and pattern matching in JavaScript.
